title: Raw low grade T207 Recruits - ALL SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: Raw low grade T207 Recruits - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
***4/22 - Take $2 off the list price of all remaining cards
——————————
Hello!  Have these T207 Recruits available for sale or to trade towards T206's if you have any available.  I'm open to offers, especially if buying multiples.  Just shoot me a PM.

Please include $3 for tracked shipping.  PWE is an option too at these prices.  Anyone saying "I'll take it" gets priority over negotiations.

$SOLD Austin no insignia
$SOLD Barry
$SOLD Becker 
$SOLD Byrnes
$SOLD Camnitz
$SOLD Cole
$SOLD Coulson
$SOLD Danforth

posts.post_title: I'll take two at minus two
posts.post_content:
Will take Strunk and Yerkes with your discount - PM coming and thanks!
James
